title: Enough of This Nonsense Malphite mid
body: I mean what the hell has this game gone to a fucking circus? Why does Malphite have such good ap scalings I have played against numerous Malphite mids and lost simply cuz he one-shot me with an r that is near impossible to dodge as a non-mobile mage like Synda or Vel'Koz. Can we not have this kind of nonsense in this game pls thnx.

Hes useless after his R combo though...like to the point where he can only hit you with his q..

shen, malp and amumu were perma banned in s2 and s3 for a reason.
also ap amumu scallings are just too OP, champ can literally solo baron faster than master yi.

They were permabanned because they were parts of [Bronzodia](https://i.ytimg.com/vi/iK2A3MvV9AA/hqdefault.jpg).

This monster capitalizes on several things.

* Even a Bronze player can recognize to go in when Amumu presses R.
* No Bronze player can sidestep Blitz Q.
* Being able to save an ally is great when your ADC is a Bronze Vayne.
he was always viable as AP malphite though.
Enough of Malphite period. Fuck this champion, a tumor in literally every role.

This has always been a thing.

It's not that good.

He bursts one guy for a pretty sizable amount at the start of the fight, maybe killing them outright and taking a couple others to half HP if he's lucky, and is almost useless from that point onward.

It'd be one thing if this were a surefire kill, but it isn't.
AP Malph has been a thing for a long time, and the game officially became a circus with that "Whose Lane Is It, Anyway?" thing.
Wait til you face one jg... they don't gank worth a darn pre 6, but when they hit 6 are atleast getting a flash.  Most often it's pick a lane, some one dies
I'm just bothered by the fact that I feel like the only person who still plays Malphite as a tank anymore.
